body:
> do you have any plans for Basket? 
> There is a Qt 4 port available Basket 2.0 Beta 1 (1.80). 
> 
> It didn't show any basket contents after installation to my home 
> directory, but that might have been a problem with the installer script in 
> the upstream archive. 
 
basket is in under our radar. 
The package should be reviewed before the upload. 
 
Cheers, 
 
Fathi 
 
 
--
